name: RVDS Inc.
description: Operator of a K-Food franchise platform focused on scaling Korean cuisine across Southeast Asia through brand localization and operational excellence. The company operates DoDoKorea, a fast-growing Korean lunchbox quick-service restaurant that has gained viral popularity in Kuala Lumpur.
